Package de.hshl.obj.wavefront

Class Wavefront.MaterialLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.wavefront.Wavefront.MaterialLoader
  • Enclosing class:
    Wavefront
    public static class Wavefront.MaterialLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Load materials from MTL files. The MaterialLoader implements the Builder Pattern in order to enable simplified configuration. Example: 
    Wavefront.materials().

      • readFile

        public MTL readFile​(java.nio.file.Path path)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Open the specified MTL resource.
        Parameters:
        path - Specifies the path of the MTL file.
        Returns:
        The built MTL containing the parsed file data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be loaded, including invalid MTL files.
        See Also:
        readFile(Path)

      • readLocalResource

        public MTL readLocalResource​(java.nio.file.Path resource)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Open the specified MTL resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - Specifies the resource name of the MTL inside the JAR resource folder.
        Returns:
        The built MTL containing the parsed file data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be loaded, including invalid MTL files.
        See Also:
        readFile(Path)
